db:abstract.db:para: Misuses of the Quick attached property types.

db:section.db:title: Attached property must be attached to an object deriving from a particular type
What happened?
db:section.db:para: You instantiated an attached property in an object of the wrong type.

db:section.db:title: Why is this bad?
db:section.db:para: The attached property will not work.

db:section.db:title: Example
db:section.db:para: To fix this warning, change the enclosing type to inherit from the type mentioned in the warning message:
